title: What is the best way to evaluate students? - Quora

response.answer_text: Firstly, all teaching must be experiential, not just class room. Secondly all evaluation must be based on application. Doctors have to be interns for a couple of years! Sports persons have to play and win games! I did an MS in IIT where the assessment was based on my research. I loved it and my study was also much more meaningful.
You can evaluate the performance of students online here at Student Evaluation Form-Student Performance Evaluation.
